testcase.name: Create a new user | Sign up - using a JS function to create an instance of the JAVA file
testcase.system-out: Given url 'https://conduit.productionready.io/api/' ....................... passed * def dataGenerator = Java.type('helpers.DataGenerator') .................. passed * def timeValidator = read('../../helpers/timeValidator.js') .............. passed * def randomEmail = dataGenerator.getRandomEmail() ........................ passed * def randomUsername = dataGenerator.getRandomUsername() .................. passed * def jsFunction = ........................................................ passed * def randomUser2 = call jsFunction ....................................... passed Given path 'users' ........................................................ passed And request ............................................................... passed When method Post .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response == ..................................................... passed
